name: Save Scriberr people to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new person is copied in Scriberr, Make will automatically add that person to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tjIuSFBwXH7FhWLUpdnGxP1eHGdcNey7eEdsqdG3Uxk/edit?usp=sharing).
